remarks: Part of proof of part 12 in [Baer] p. 49 line 4, aS=bS iff a=b in their notation (S = sigma).  The sigma map is one-to-one.  (Contributed by NM, 26-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmap12d.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmap12d.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap12d.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmap12d.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap12d.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmap12d.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmap12d.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmap11 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` X ) = ( S ` Y ) <-> X = Y ) ) $.
